title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 98 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 98 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
lineList.cn: （一篇诗）你们要向耶和华唱新歌。因为他行过奇妙的事。他的右手和圣臂，施行救恩。

lineList.en: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
lineList.cn: 耶和华发明了他的救恩，在列邦人眼前显出公义。

lineList.en: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
lineList.cn: 记念他向以色列家所发的慈爱，所凭的信实。地的四极，都看见我们神的救恩。

lineList.en: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.
lineList.cn: 全地都要向耶和华欢乐。要发起大声欢呼歌颂。

lineList.en: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.
lineList.cn: 要用琴歌颂耶和华，用琴和诗歌的声音歌颂他。

lineList.en: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.
lineList.cn: 用号和角声，在大君王耶和华面前欢呼。

lineList.en: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
lineList.cn: 愿海和其中所充满的澎湃。世界和住在其间的，也要发声。

lineList.en: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together
lineList.cn: 愿大水拍手。愿诸山在耶和华面前一同欢呼。

lineList.en: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
lineList.cn: 因为他来，要审判遍地。他要按公义审判世界，按公正审判万民。
